Summary Note:
Josefiina Aino Hiltunen and the RM were introduced at an art auction in Helsinki. They bonded over their appreciation for contemporary art and exchanged contact information to discuss potential collaborations.
Josefiina Aino Hiltunen is a 29 year old and comes from Finland.
After extensive research, she chose Julius Baer for its strong track record in managing high-net-worth clients.
Family Background: Josefiina Aino Hiltunen is married to Niskanen. They do not have any children.
Education Background:
Josefiina finished secondary school at Siuntion lukio in 2014.
Josefiina graduated from University of Jyväskylä in 2020, completing her higher education.
Occupation History:
Josefiina Aino Hiltunen is a 29 year old and comes from Finland.
At Danske Bank Wealth Management, Josefiina Aino Hiltunen held the position of Financial Advisor from 2020 to 2024, developing essential skills in the field.
Wealth Summary:
Throughout her career, she saved 20000 EUR, investing in various assets to grow her wealth.
Client does not have any properties.
Following the passing of her grandmother, a successful Hedge Fund Manager, she received an inheritance of 2810000 EUR in 2018, which she has used to secure her financial future.
Client Summary: The RM is very happy to have Josefiina as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
